issue.message: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE no longer provides write access when targeting Android 10, unless you use `requestLegacyExternalStorage`
Notification icon ic_stat_play_dark has to have a raster image to support Android versions below 5.0 (API 21)
Notification icon ic_stat_play_light has to have a raster image to support Android versions below 5.0 (API 21)
Notification icon ic_stat_ultrasonic has to have a raster image to support Android versions below 5.0 (API 21)
Layout parameter `layout_gravity` ignored unless both `layout_width` and `layout_height` are also specified on `<include>` tag
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
"lizensiert" is a common misspelling; did you mean "lizenziert" ?
Formatting %d followed by words ("Artists"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Formatting %d followed by words ("tracks"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string
Formatting %d followed by words ("tracks"): This should probably be a plural rather than a string

Using the `AllowAllHostnameVerifier` HostnameVerifier is unsafe because it always returns true, which could cause insecure network traffic due to trusting TLS/SSL server certificates for wrong hostnames
issue.errorLine1: public static final X509HostnameVerifier ALLOW_ALL_HOSTNAME_VERIFIER = new AllowAllHostnameVerifier();
